1372790.name: Aim FTW - The Forge
1372790.description:
Train the way you want so that you can play the way you dream™. Aim FTW - The Forge takes Aim FTW to a new level. Here you can adjust the gameplay to challenge you the way you want so that you can get the training you deserve.

Here are just some of the details you can change to fit your gameplay:

  • Configure targets, monsters and agents
  • Determine how many targets you face
  • Set where targets spawn and when
  • Decide if targets move, scale, heal and more
  • Choose which agents and monsters you want to battle
  • Set how many will attack you at once
  • Determine how they spawn and more

All of these details are currently customizable in-game, and we aren’t even done building yet! We have a number of HUGE features in development that will further increase the range of customization available to you meaning you’ll be able to create even more custom scenarios to suit your training regimen.

Have an idea on how to give players a competitive edge? Tell us and let us build it for you! We might even name it after you :)

A few of the many great innovations that you can expect in future releases:

  • More target options - change their size, shape, color and more.
  • More agents and monsters with more settings.
  • Save your favorite scenarios!
  • New maps!

Download The Forge today and take your game to the next level!
1372790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
